name: Obesity-project
body:
# Obesity is one of the most common health complications among 
the youth. There is an overwhelming 17% of teenagers who are 
        suffering from obesity in America. This is a problem because obesity
        can cause many health complications in the future. A person who is 
        obese has a higher chance of having heart disease, diabetes, and 
        even a shorter life expectancy.

# We have dedicated an interactive app that
        is able to help teenagers with their health. We do not mainly focus
        on numbers, instead we try to get to know our users habits, hobbies,
        and we try to create a friendly and calm environment.

# Our interactive app has 4 main sections: the profile, tracker,
        community, and articles. The profile is the private custumization corner for the user. The trackers records and
        presents data such as weight, steps, and even mood. The community is the social hub for the 
        user. This is where a user can connect with other users to create a safe and motivatioanl
        environment. Finally, the articles provide essential information for the user to 
        lose weight and live a healthier lifestyle.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
